titleStmt.title: The second part of The great question concerning things indifferent in religious vvorship briefly stated, and tendred to the consideration of all conscientious and sober men / by the same author.
Great question concerning things indifferent in religious worship. Part 2
titleStmt.author: Bagshaw, Edward, 1629-1671.

notesStmt.note: The first part was published in 1660.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
